content.text:
# Screen Award for Best Music Director

The Screen Award for Best Music Director is chosen by a distinguished panel of judges from the Indian Bollywood film industry and the winners are announced in January.
Superlatives
Multiple wins
{| class="wikitable"
|+
!Wins
!Recipient
|-
|5
|A. R. Rahman
|-
|4
|Pritam
|-
|3
|Shankar–Ehsaan–Loy
|-
|2
|Nadeem-Shravan, Rajesh Roshan, Anu Malik, Ankit Tiwari
|}
Multiple nominees
{| class="wikitable"
|+
!Nominations
!Recipient
|-
|5
|Anu Malik, A. R. Rahman, Pritam, Shankar–Ehsaan–Loy
|-
|4
|Amit Trivedi
|-
|3
|Jatin–Lalit, Mithoon, Yo Yo Honey Singh
|-
|2
|Rajesh Roshan, Sajid–Wajid, Ankit Tiwari
|}
Winners and nominees
* Winners are highlighted first in gold, followed by the other nominees.
† – Indicates the performance also won the Filmfare Award for Best Music Director‡ – Indicates the performance was also nominated for the Filmfare Award for Best Music Director
